DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study assess safety tolerability Glucagon-like peptide-1 ( GLP-1 ) peptide analogue CM3.1-AC100 single subcutaneous ( sc ) dose patient T2DM .
DOC.brief_title: Single-centre , Randomised , Double-blind , Placebo-controlled , Four-way Crossover Clinical Study Investigate Safety Tolerability Pharmacokinetics Single Doses CM3.1-AC100 Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
